The Ram 2500 is a heavy-duty pickup truck built for serious towing and hauling. Available with a powerful Cummins turbo diesel, it delivers exceptional capability while maintaining Ram's signature refined interior.

The Ram 3500 is the ultimate heavy-duty pickup offering class-leading towing capacity. With the available Cummins diesel producing massive torque, it's the choice for the heaviest commercial and recreational towing demands.

name: ProMaster
description: The Ram ProMaster is a full-size cargo van designed for commercial use and upfitting versatility. Its front-wheel-drive layout creates a low load floor while the spacious cargo area accommodates diverse business needs.

name: G90
description: The Genesis G90 is the brand's flagship luxury sedan showcasing Korean automotive excellence. It rivals the Mercedes S-Class and BMW 7 Series with opulent appointments, refined ride quality, and exceptional value.

name: GV60
description: The Genesis GV60 is a compact all-electric luxury crossover built on Hyundai's E-GMP platform. It combines Genesis premium design with cutting-edge EV technology including Face Connect and a crystal sphere gear selector.

name: 5 Series
description: The BMW 5 Series is a midsize luxury sport sedan that exemplifies the brand's balance of driving dynamics and executive comfort. A perennial benchmark in its class, it offers powerful engines and cutting-edge technology.

name: X5
description: The BMW X5 is a midsize luxury SUV that pioneered the sports activity vehicle segment. Known for its athletic handling, powerful engine options, and luxurious interior, it remains one of BMW's best-selling models.

name: X1
description: The BMW X1 is a compact luxury crossover combining BMW's sporty driving character with everyday versatility. As the brand's most accessible SUV, it delivers premium features and efficient turbocharged performance.

name: 7 Series
description: The BMW 7 Series is the brand's flagship luxury sedan, offering the ultimate in comfort, technology, and performance. It showcases BMW's most advanced features and sets the standard for executive sedans.

name: 4 Series
description: The BMW 4 Series is a premium coupe and convertible offering athletic performance and elegant styling. It builds on 3 Series underpinnings with a more dramatic design and sport-focused character.

name: E-Class
description: The Mercedes-Benz E-Class is a midsize luxury sedan that has defined executive motoring for decades. Known for exceptional comfort, cutting-edge safety technology, and refined powertrains.

name: GLC
description: The Mercedes-Benz GLC is a compact luxury SUV and one of the brand's best-selling models worldwide. It delivers a smooth ride, elegant cabin, and a range of powertrains including plug-in hybrid options.

name: S-Class
description: The Mercedes-Benz S-Class is the pinnacle of automotive luxury and technology, serving as the brand's flagship sedan. It consistently debuts the most advanced features in the industry before they trickle down to other models.

name: GLA
description: The Mercedes-Benz GLA is a subcompact luxury crossover blending urban agility with Mercedes-Benz sophistication. It offers turbocharged power, available 4MATIC AWD, and the brand's signature premium interior.

name: A-Class
description: The Mercedes-Benz A-Class is a compact luxury sedan serving as the brand's entry point. It features the MBUX infotainment system, turbocharged performance, and Mercedes-Benz build quality in a city-friendly size.

name: Q7
description: The Audi Q7 is a full-size luxury three-row SUV combining spacious seating with refined performance. Known for its smooth ride, advanced technology, and premium materials throughout the cabin.

name: A6
description: The Audi A6 is a midsize luxury sedan known for its elegant design, cutting-edge technology, and refined ride quality. It competes at the heart of the luxury sedan market with powerful engine options and Audi's acclaimed virtual cockpit.

name: Q3
description: The Audi Q3 is a subcompact luxury crossover offering premium amenities in a city-friendly package. It features turbocharged power, available Quattro AWD, and Audi's signature interior quality.

name: A3
description: The Audi A3 is a premium compact sedan combining sophisticated design with turbocharged performance. As Audi's entry-level luxury offering, it delivers a refined driving experience with the brand's signature Quattro all-wheel drive and advanced technology.

name: e-tron
description: The Audi e-tron is an all-electric luxury SUV marking Audi's entry into the EV market. It combines typical Audi luxury and build quality with dual-motor all-wheel drive and impressive electric range.

name: Pathfinder
description: The Nissan Pathfinder is a three-row midsize SUV designed for family adventures. It combines capable performance with modern technology and spacious seating for up to eight passengers.

name: Sentra
description: The Nissan Sentra is a compact sedan delivering an upscale experience at an affordable price. Recent generations feature bold styling, advanced safety tech, and a comfortable interior that punches above its class.

name: Frontier
description: The Nissan Frontier is a midsize pickup truck offering rugged capability with everyday practicality. Known for its reliable powertrain and competitive value in the midsize truck segment.

name: Murano
description: The Nissan Murano is a midsize luxury-leaning crossover with distinctive styling and a refined cabin. Known for its comfortable ride, Zero Gravity seats, and V6 power.

name: Kicks
description: The Nissan Kicks is a subcompact crossover delivering excellent fuel economy and modern technology at an accessible price point. Its bold styling and efficient powertrain make it a smart city vehicle.

name: Versa
description: The Nissan Versa is a subcompact sedan offering exceptional value with standard safety features and a spacious interior for its class. It provides reliable transportation at one of the lowest entry prices in the market.
